name: coze-loop (coze-dev)
description: [项目级] Next-generation AI Agent Optimization Platform: Cozeloop addresses challenges in AI agent development by providing full-lifecycle management capabilities from development, debugging, and evaluation to monitoring.  。来源: https://github.com/coze-dev/coze-loop

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Next-generation AI Agent Optimization Platform: Cozeloop addresses challenges in AI agent development by providing full-lifecycle management capabilities from development, debugging, and evaluation to monitoring.  

来源: https://github.com/coze-dev/coze-loop
语言: Go
Stars: 5323

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
>
> Refer to [Quick Start](https://github.com/coze-dev/coze-loop/wiki/2.-Quickstart) to learn in detail how to install and deploy the latest version of Coze Loop.

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
| **Feature** | **Functional points** | | --- | --- | | Prompt debugging | *Playground debugging and comparison
* Prompt version management | | Evaluation | *Manage evaluation sets
Management evaluator
* Manage experiments | | Observation | SDK trace reporting
* Trace data observation | | Model | Support integration with OpenAI, Volcengine Ark, and other models |
